channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere Application Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere Application Server

item.title: CVE-2017-1381|2024-09-16T17:54:22.193Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Proxy Server or On-demand-router (ODR) 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, 9.0 and could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by stale data being cached and then served. IBM X-Force ID: 127152.

item.title: CVE-2017-1788|2024-09-16T17:08:51.135Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 9 installations using Form Login could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 137031.

item.title: CVE-2021-38951|2024-09-16T16:47:45.409Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially-crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume all available CPU resources. IBM X-Force ID: 211405.

item.title: CVE-2021-20353|2024-09-16T16:13:58.804Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 194882.

item.title: CVE-2021-20492|2024-09-16T17:15:21.724Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.0, 8.5, 9.0, and Liberty Java Batch is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 197793.

item.title: CVE-2022-35282|2024-09-16T17:32:35.556Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker with local network access could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive data.

item.title: CVE-2018-1770|2024-09-16T17:34:30.588Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 148686.

item.title: CVE-2019-4663|2024-09-16T17:03:38.088Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server - Liberty is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 171245.

item.title: CVE-2022-22477|2024-09-16T16:32:43.058Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 225605.

item.title: CVE-2022-22473|2024-09-16T16:28:56.687Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information caused by improper handling of Administrative Console data. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 225347.

item.title: CVE-2020-4578|2024-09-16T17:37:38.647Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 184433.

item.title: CVE-2019-4305|2024-09-16T17:33:10.000Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information caused by the improper setting of a cookie. IBM X-Force ID: 160951.

item.title: CVE-2017-1501|2024-09-16T16:27:33.954Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 could provide weaker than expected security after using the Admin Console to update the web services security bindings settings. IBM X-Force ID: 129576.

item.title: CVE-2021-20454|2024-09-16T17:33:20.448Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 196649.

item.title: CVE-2017-1504|2024-09-16T16:23:00.923Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server version 9.0.0.4 could provide weaker than expected security after using the PasswordUtil command to enable AES password encryption. IBM X-Force ID: 129579.

item.title: CVE-2018-1926|2024-09-16T16:33:55.974Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 Admin Console is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a user to visit a malicious URL, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform CSRF attack and update available applications. IBM X-Force ID: 152992.

item.title: CVE-2019-4080|2024-09-16T16:18:50.696Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Admin Console 7.5, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to a potential denial of service, caused by improper parameter parsing. A remote attacker could exploit this to consume all available CPU resources. IBM X-Force ID: 157380.

item.title: CVE-2023-50315|2024-08-14T17:43:47.744Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 could allow an attacker with access to the network to conduct spoofing attacks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a certificate issued by a trusted authority to obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 274714.

item.title: CVE-2024-35153|2024-08-02T03:07:46.474Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows a privileged user to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 292640.

item.title: CVE-2024-35154|2024-08-02T03:07:46.791Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker, who has authorized access to the administrative console, to execute arbitrary code. Using specially crafted input, the attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 292641.

item.title: CVE-2024-37532|2024-08-02T03:57:39.626Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to identity spoofing by an authenticated user due to improper signature validation. IBM X-Force ID: 294721.

item.title: CVE-2024-35154|2024-07-10T13:14:29.553Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker, who has authorized access to the administrative console, to execute arbitrary code. Using specially crafted input, the attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 292641.

item.title: CVE-2023-50313|2024-07-05T17:22:24.690Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 could provide weaker than expected security for outbound TLS connections caused by a failure to honor user configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 274812.

item.title: CVE-2024-35153|2024-06-27T19:06:19.916Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows a privileged user to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 292640.

item.title: CVE-2024-37532|2024-06-25T13:08:09.501Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to identity spoofing by an authenticated user due to improper signature validation. IBM X-Force ID: 294721.

item.title: CVE-2024-37532|2024-06-20T13:22:16.089Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to identity spoofing by an authenticated user due to improper signature validation. IBM X-Force ID: 294721.

item.title: CVE-2024-25026|2024-06-04T17:35:52.765Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.4 are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 281516.

item.title: CVE-2024-22329|2024-06-04T17:52:29.944Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.3 are vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct the SSRF attack. X-Force ID: 279951.

item.title: CVE-2024-22354|2024-05-22T19:35:18.159Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.5 are vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information, consume memory resources, or to conduct a server-side request forgery attack. IBM X-Force ID: 280401.

item.title: CVE-2023-50313|2024-04-02T12:54:31.145Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 could provide weaker than expected security for outbound TLS connections caused by a failure to honor user configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 274812.

item.title: CVE-2024-37532|2024-06-25T03:55:29.783Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to identity spoofing by an authenticated user due to improper signature validation. IBM X-Force ID: 294721.

item.title: CVE-2024-35153|2024-06-27T17:19:04.529Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows a privileged user to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 292640.

item.title: CVE-2024-22354|2024-06-28T20:07:50.938Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.5 are vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information, consume memory resources, or to conduct a server-side request forgery attack. IBM X-Force ID: 280401.

item.title: CVE-2024-35154|2024-07-09T21:57:32.820Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker, who has authorized access to the administrative console, to execute arbitrary code. Using specially crafted input, the attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 292641.

item.title: CVE-2024-22354|2024-08-01T22:43:34.570Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.5 are vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information, consume memory resources, or to conduct a server-side request forgery attack. IBM X-Force ID: 280401.

item.title: CVE-2024-22329|2024-08-01T22:43:34.151Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.3 are vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct the SSRF attack. X-Force ID: 279951.

item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 could provide weaker than expected security for outbound TLS connections caused by a failure to honor user configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 274812.
